import React from "react"; import Layout from "../components/Layout"; import NavOne from "../components/NavOne"; import Donate from "../components/Donate"; import PageHeader from "../components/PageHeader"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import EventsDetail from "../components/EventsDetail"; export default function EventsDetailPage({ eventName, backgroundColor, month, day, year, imgSrc, title, paragraphOne, paragraphTwo, startingTime, location, contactEmail, }) { return (
{day} {month}

{title}

{paragraphOne}

{paragraphTwo}

Event Details

  • Starting Time: {startingTime}
  • Date: {month} {day}, {year}
  • Website: {contactEmail}
  • Location: {location}
); }
